thread.title: BlackBerry Priv official promo details slider keyboard, focuses on ease of use
thread.title_full: BlackBerry Priv official promo details slider keyboard, focuses on ease of use - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: BlackBerry Priv official promo details slider keyboard, focuses on ease of use
text: Priv, BlackBerry’s first Android-based smartphone, is set to be launched soon. The smartphone has already generated a lot of buzz for its unique design, BlackBerry’s stint with Android and perhaps the fact that its success will decide the company’s future. While the official images of the Priv have already been released, BlackBerry has now launched an official promo video detailing the functionalities of the smartphone. In the video, BlackBerry tries to convince how the slider design – though reminiscent to the phones in 2005-2006 – helps make optimum use of the a touchscreen and physical QWERTY keyboard. While the video focuses on design and ease of use, BlackBerry in a separate blog post explained how the new phone surpasses the »
